sentences.english: Bandai Namco will deliver lounges for Tekken, Ridge Racer, and Soul Calibur.
sentences.chinese: 万代游戏将提供休息室的铁拳，山脊赛车，并刀魂。

sentences.english: While it has been a long time coming, Tekken 6 is looking just fine.
sentences.chinese: 经过一段长时间的试玩后，《铁拳6》真的挺不错的。

sentences.english: It was the beginning of the end for Iron Mike.
sentences.chinese: 铁拳迈克的末路也由此开始。

sentences.english: Ministers promised what they called an ‘iron fist’ to restore order.
sentences.chinese: 埃及司法部长警告说，政府将以“铁拳”来恢复秩序。

sentences.english: But I was also really good in Tekken before.
sentences.chinese: 不过我以前玩铁拳也很不错。

sentences.english: We expect Tekken 6 to be good and shiny when it ships later this year.
sentences.chinese: 经过一段长时间的试玩后，《铁拳6》真的挺不错的。

sentences.english: Does this mean that Russia will get away with its smash-and-grab operation?
sentences.chinese: 这是否意味着俄罗斯会放弃其铁拳模式？

sentences.english: In the "iron fist" exercise, the Japanese brought the Toyota trucks and Humvees.
sentences.chinese: 在“铁拳”演习中，日本人带来了丰田卡车和悍马车。

sentences.english: I took them outside and wrapped them on that statue of the clenched fist.
sentences.chinese: 我把它们带到外面并包在铁拳的塑像上。

sentences.english: The iron- fist policy towards the fundamentalists is unlikely to be interrupted.
sentences.chinese: 对原教旨主义者采取的铁拳政策不可能中止。

sentences.english: Top police chief warns terrorists of 'iron fist' .
sentences.chinese: 公安部部长警告新疆恐怖分子小心人民铁拳。

definition: hand formed into a flat shape, as for a karate chop
to face an attack/to repulse the enemy
